```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.retina = 2)
d <- read_csv("results.csv")

# Take the latest tests
d <- d %>% 
  arrange(cpu, os, date) %>% 
  distinct(.keep_all = TRUE)
```

```{r results-columns, fig.height = 12}
d %>% 
  ggplot(aes(mean, paste(os, cpu, sep = "\n"))) +
  scale_x_continuous(
    "Mean execution time", expand = expansion(c(0, .1))
  ) +
  geom_col() +
  facet_wrap("expr", ncol = 1) +
  theme(axis.title.y = element_blank())
```
